_: I wanted to build something unique and interesting without using any of the external packages or plugins.

This is a wireframe of a 3D cube.

You can pinch to zoom in and out.
But 3D is not interesting enough. So here is a 4D cube.

4D cube or tesseract performing a double rotation around x and w axis.

Now we have a 2D canvas that is drawing the 3D shadow of a 4D object.
Thank you for your time, enjoy your day with this beautiful Tesseract rotating.
